mutants.code:
def count_median_values(N, A, B):
    A.sort()
    B.sort()
    if N % 2 != 1:
        median_min = A[(N - 1) // 2]
        median_max = B[(N - 1) // 2]
        return median_max - median_min + 1
    else:
        median_min = A[N // 2 - 1] + A[N // 2]
        median_max = B[N // 2 - 1] + B[N // 2]
        return median_max - median_min + 1

def count_median_values(N, A, B):
    A.sort()
    B.sort()
    if N * 2 == 1:
        median_min = A[(N - 1) // 2]
        median_max = B[(N - 1) // 2]
        return median_max - median_min + 1
    else:
        median_min = A[N // 2 - 1] + A[N // 2]
        median_max = B[N // 2 - 1] + B[N // 2]
        return median_max - median_min + 1

    A.sort()
    B.sort()
